response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic chance to own something truly remarkable. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
